product_name: Patagonia Lightweight Travel Hip Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for travel and sightseeing, the Patagonia Lightweight Travel Hip Pack lets you keep valuables within easy reach. Soft, flexible webbing belt lets you carry the Patagonia Lightweight Travel Hip pack around your hips or across the chest, bandolier style. Main compartment holds larger items like sunglasses, a wallet and point-and-shoot camera, and interior pocket secures sensitive items like a passport or credit card. Zippered exterior pocket provides quick access to sunscreen, tissues and a map, and interior features a key clip. Made from double-ripstop nylon with a reinforced bottom and coated to resist water and stains. Stows into its own pocket when not in use. Closeout.
short_description: Great for travel and sightseeing, the Patagonia Lightweight Travel Hip Pack lets you keep valuables within easy reach.
